column5: hello! I’m new here! I need to catch some tilapia from a nullah and was wondering the best bait to use for rod and line. Looking through the treads, prawn seems to be effective, but I also note that thread-like algae is also a winner. Any idea what this is and where to get it? thanks
I didn’t know Canada even had tilapia!
Welcome aboard new guy. This is a great place with great people. X2 on the tilapia. Didn’t know they were up there.

Welcome aboard !!! Talapia cannot survive in water cooler than 45’F…. they can only survive the southern most part of Florida in N America. I would guess he is planning to go somewhere warm, like Southern Asia… I get my Talapia in the fresh fish cooler at the store big G
Hi, I’m new also here! I love catching tilapia since that was my favorite. Need some ideas from you guys as well. Thanks..
